introduction: 第三届（欧洲）中国纪录片电影节（Les écrans De Chine）获奖影片英国万象国际电影节竞赛单元Electronic Girl, 20 minutes她是针刺电音厂牌创始者之一，她是INTRO电子音乐节组织者之一，病魔带走了她的长发，但不能带走她的想法，她是王淼，依旧行走在梦想的路上…《电镀女孩儿》 ，INTRO音乐节背后的 感人故事As one of the founders for acupuncture records and one of the organizers of INTRO Electronic music festival, she still holds on her dreams, and she is Wang Miao. The serious illness can only take away her long hair, not her thought. Electroplating Girl, touching story behind the INTRO music festival
